channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-24129] TopicRangeTest.rangeCreationHaveALimitedScope fails on Azure
item.description:
The test TopicRangeTest.rangeCreationHaveALimitedScope fails on Azure with
